snippet: A memorial service for Mark O’Donnell, the Tony Award-winning librettist of the Broadway musical “Hairspray,” will be held on Monday.
abstract: Many friends, family members and theater colleagues will attend memorial service for Mark O’Donnell, Tony Award-winning librettist of Broadway musical Hairspray.
lead_paragraph: A memorial service for Mark O’Donnell, the Tony Award-winning librettist of the Broadway musical “Hairspray,” will be held on Monday.
